# Bookmarks 

A collection of helpful resources that I might want to find again in the future or point other people towards.

### Advice: Faculty 

- [Thread](https://twitter.com/sarahlsheffield/status/1553811480264560641) by Sarah Sheffield (@sarahsheffield) advice for new faculty. 
- [Course](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1j4ckk6TVKScNQSZTQOY5hI1HEiJLRS_k/view) Free 10 week course on google drive about writing academic an academic syllabus. Course by @DLabree, recommended by Elena Aydarova (@aydarova).
- [Tweet](https://twitter.com/GeroGrams/status/1526924778170359808) by Gero Grams (@GeroGrams) on how to say no to things
- [Thread]() by Mine Dogucu (@MineDogucu) on learning/teaching (with) R. See also:
	- [Compilation of free R resources](learnR4free.com) 
	- [Bayesian inference book](bayesrulesbook.com) 
	- [Teaching webpage](mdogucu.ics.uci.edu/teaching.html) 
	- [Blog on data pedagogy](datapedagogy.com)
- [Thread](https://twitter.com/wes_kao/status/1533463689097056256) by Wes Kao (@wes_kao) on managing up
- [Thread](https://twitter.com/VnVrinda/status/1517652396041818115?s=20&t=cXDVFRK_1_IKKHHyiRKLVw) by Vrinda Nair (@VnVrinda) on 22 tools for your PhD Journey
- Managing research careers tool by Edinburgh University [Thread](https://twitter.com/BoswellPol/status/1556904096644431872?s=20&t=cXDVFRK_1_IKKHHyiRKLVw) and [Webpage](https://www.ed.ac.uk/researchers/career-development/research-careers-tool)
- [Talk](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jmdz0p_gTww) by Laura Albert (@lauraalbertphd) on time management: Do less, Do it faster, Do it at the right time. 


### Advice: Graduate Students 

- [Thread](https://twitter.com/MTJBetts/status/1548251832903823365) by Matt Betts on 8 questions to consider before starting a PhD.
- [Thread](https://twitter.com/MCDuncanLab/status/1553399486831104002) by Maram Duncan (@MCDuncanLab) on the hidden curriculum for new grad students 
- [Thread](https://twitter.com/LifeAfterMyPhD/status/1536051032261660674) by @LifeAfterMyPhD on 5 low-stakes steps to set yourself up for an industry job search
- [Thread](https://twitter.com/mathladyhazel/status/1518059799602253824?s=20&t=cXDVFRK_1_IKKHHyiRKLVw) by @mathladyhazel on the best math books for self-learners
- [Thread](https://twitter.com/alexeble/status/1019278324680593408?s=20&t=cXDVFRK_1_IKKHHyiRKLVw) by Alex Eble (@alexeble) on adivce for thriving in a PhD. Full document [here](http://alexeble.com/s/PhDGuidebook.pdf). Note: has US and economics focus, but translates well.
- [Website](https://www-users.york.ac.uk/~mb55/pubs/pbstnote.htm) Stats Notes in the British Medical Journal. Like a dictionary but for stats words and methods.
